review: According to the ad on your site , you can get an app to be able to speak what show you want, When I tried to download the app it was not for this TV stick. Otherwise it works great.

review: Wonderful technology allows any regular television to become a smart TV.  Love the amazon fire stick.  Would recommend it unreservedly.

review: I love the Fire Stick.  It has kept my partner and I entertained.  I am not sure how this is different from the original Fire TV, but I think it does all the same things, maybe just less storage on the device itself.
author: kathryn
